items.question: How does Cocoti keep my tontines secure?
items.answer: We rely on bank-grade encryption, multi-factor approvals and access monitoring to protect every transaction.

items.question: What fees should I expect?
items.answer: Private tontines stay free. Advanced features (public tontines, automation) live in Premium starting at $15 per month.

items.question: Is it built for the diaspora?
items.answer: Absolutely. Cocoti supports multiple currencies and payment methods while optimizing transfer rates across Europe, the US and Africa.

items.question: Can I try it before subscribing?
items.answer: Yes, enjoy a 14-day free trial on the Premium plan to explore every capability.

items.question: How can I reach support?
items.answer: Chat with us in-app, send an email or use WhatsApp Business 7 days a week. Premium groups also get a dedicated Success Manager.
